      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
            test "index with token authentication via request headers" do
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
              sign_out User.first
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
              @request.headers['X-User-Email'] = users(:one).email
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
              @request.headers['X-User-Token'] = users(:one).authentication_token
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
              get :index, format: :json
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
              assert_response :success
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
            end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
            test "should submit DR event through the API" do
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
              sign_out User.first
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
              users(:one).add_role :admin
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
              starttime = DateTime.now + 1.hour
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
              newDRsignal = {
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                  interval_id: Interval.find_by_name("15 minutes").id,
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  prosumer_category_id: prosumer_categories(:one).id,
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  dr_targets_attributes: 10.times.map do | i |
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                    {
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                        volume: rand(5.0...50.0),
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          10
          
                        timestamp: (starttime + (i * Interval.find_by_name("15 minutes").duration).seconds).to_s
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          10
          
                    }
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                  end
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              }
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
          
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
              json = ""
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
              assert_difference('DemandResponse.count') do
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                # puts({demand_response: newDRsignal, user_email: users(:one).email, user_token: users(:one).authentication_token, format: :json}.to_json)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                post :create, demand_response: newDRsignal, user_email: users(:one).email, user_token: users(:one).authentication_token, format: :json
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                # puts @response.body
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                json = JSON.parse @response.body
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                # puts @response.body
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
              assert_response 201
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
              assert_equal newDRsignal[:interval_id], json["interval_id"]
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
              newDRsignal[:dr_targets_attributes].zip(json["dr_targets"]).each do |e,a|
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          10
          
                assert_equal DateTime.parse(e[:timestamp]), DateTime.parse(a["timestamp"])
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          10
          
                assert_in_delta e[:volume], a["volume"], 0.00001
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
            end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          end
        
      118.

    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
            test "should destroy forecast" do
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
              assert_difference('Forecast.count', -1) do
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
                delete :destroy, id: @forecast
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
              assert_redirected_to forecasts_path
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
            end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          end
        
      51.

          1

    45. 
          1

      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                begin
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  delete :destroy, id: @interval

                rescue
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
              assert_response 200
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
            end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          end

    test/controllers/prosumers_controller_test.rb

          1
          
          class ProsumersControllerTest < ActionController::TestCase

          1

          1

    23. 
          1
          
                pr = post :create, prosumer: { location: @prosumer.location, 
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                                               name: @prosumer.name, 
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                                               edms_id: SecureRandom.uuid }
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
              assert_redirected_to prosumer_path(assigns(:prosumer))
        
      29.

      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31.

          1

      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
              get :show, id: @prosumer
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              assert_response :success
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
            test "should get edit" do
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
              get :edit, id: @prosumer
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
              assert_response :success
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
            test "should update prosumer" do
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
              patch :update, id: @prosumer, prosumer: { location: @prosumer.location, name: @prosumer.name }
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              assert_redirected_to prosumer_path(assigns(:prosumer))
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
            end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
            test "should destroy prosumer" do
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
              assert_difference('Prosumer.count', -1) do
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                delete :destroy, id: @prosumer
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              end

            test "DataPoints should have 16266 data_points" do
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
              assert_equal 221452, DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers).count
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          33

      10.

      11. 
      
        
    11.

      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          320
          
                  sd = Time.at(secs)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          320
          
                  ed = sd + 1.week

                  p.data_points.where(
        
      15. 
      
        
    15.

      16. 
      
        
    16.

      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          320
          
                  ).where("consumption > ?", 0).count

      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20.

      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23.

      24.

                p.data_points
        
      25.

    26.

      27.

                    .count
        
      28.

              end.sum

            def load_prosumption_data

              if Prosumer.where(id: 3001..12050).count == 0

          2

      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          38
          
              @prosumers = @prosumers.reject do |p|
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          #       Rails.logger.debug p.data_points.where(interval: 2, timestamp: startdate .. enddate).count
        
      63.

                    p.data_points

          199994

                      succ += 1 if row.reject{|k,v| k == "week"}.map{|k,v| v.to_f}.max > 8
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                      total += 1
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                    # assert_operator succ, :>, total / 2
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    # assert_file "results/test_#{i}_before.csv"
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    # assert_file "results/test_#{i}_after.csv"
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              end

              File.open("data_points/hedno_prosumption_data.csv", "wb") do |f|

      93.

                                   prosumer_id,
        
      94.

                                   production,

                  while row=conn.get_copy_data

          1

              total_consumption = DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers, interval: 1).group(:prosumer).sum(:consumption)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              total_production = DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers, interval: 1).group(:prosumer).sum(:production)

      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              avg_total_consumption_vect = DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers, interval: 1).group(:prosumer_id).group("extract(year from timestamp)").group("extract(month from timestamp)").sum(:consumption)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              avg_total_production_vect = DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers, interval: 1).group(:prosumer_id).group("extract(year from timestamp)").group("extract(month from timestamp)").sum(:production)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              avg_max_consumption_vect = DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers, interval: 1).group(:prosumer_id).group("extract(year from timestamp)").group("extract(month from timestamp)").maximum(:consumption)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
              avg_max_production_vect = DataPoint.where(prosumer: @prosumers, interval: 1).group(:prosumer_id).group("extract(year from timestamp)").group("extract(month from timestamp)").maximum(:production)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
              avg_total_consumption = @prosumers.map do |p|
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                [ p,
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  1.upto(12).sum do |m|
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    avg_total_consumption_vect[[p.id,2015.to_f,m.to_f]] / 12.0
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                ]
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              end.to_h
        
      140.

      141. 
      
        
    141.

      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                [ p,
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  1.upto(12).sum do |m|
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                    avg_total_production_vect[[p.id,2015.to_f,m.to_f]] / 12.0
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                ]
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
              end.to_h
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              avg_max_consumption = @prosumers.map do |p|
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                [ p,
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  1.upto(12).sum do |m|
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                    (avg_max_consumption_vect[[p.id,2015.to_f,m.to_f]] || 0) / 12.0
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                ]
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              end.to_h
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
          
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              avg_max_production = @prosumers.map do |p|
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                [ p,
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                  1.upto(12).sum do |m|
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                    (avg_max_production_vect[[p.id,2015.to_f,m.to_f]] || 0) / 12.0

              failed = 0

                  cl.save

      175.

                          DataPoint.where(prosumer: results_no_f[:prosumers], timestamp: start + (i * interval).seconds, interval: Interval.find_by(duration: interval)).sum('COALESCE(consumption,0) - COALESCE(production,0)')
        
      176.
